features: REVIVE DRY, DAMAGED HAIR: TRESemmé Moisture Rich Conditioner hair care for Dry Hair delivers optimized hydration that targets dryness and locks in moisture where your hair needs it most
RESTORE VIBRANCY: This lightweight moisturizing conditioner is formulated with vitamin E and biotin to help soften hair without weighing it down
ADVANCED MOISTURIZING SYSTEM: Our moisturizing conditioner delivers optimized hydration that targets dryness where your hair needs it most
CONDITIONER THAT DELIVERS: TRESemmé helps revive dry hair and restores vibrancy with gentle moisturizers for touchably soft hair with professional-looking shine that lasts for days
MORE THAN HAIR PRODUCTS: TRESemmé is committed to advancing the next generation of female leaders by creating an intentional momentum forward
PAMPER YOUR HAIR: Treat yourself to TRESemmé Moisture Rich hair products—from a conditioning mask to a detangling spray—to create beautiful styles on the go without the hefty price tag.
body.description: When it comes to replenishing moisture to dry locks, use TRESemmé Moisture Rich Conditioner for Dry Hair to restore natural vibrancy for a healthy look and eye-catching shine. TRESemmé wants you to look and feel your best, which is why the TRESemmé Moisture Rich System delivers optimized hydration that targets dryness and locks in moisture where your hair needs it most—every day. Enriched with vitamin E, this lightweight conditioner is designed to deliver optimum hydration that targets dryness and seals in moisture. The lightweight formula means you can turn dry, damaged hair into soft, manageable strands with beautiful shine. It’s also safe for colored hair. How to use the Moisture Rich System: Step 1: Coat hair with a liberal amount of TRESemmé Moisture Rich Shampoo. Step 2: Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather. Step 3: Lightly squeeze the shampoo from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly. Step 4: Apply an adequate amount of Moisture Rich Conditioner from mid-shaft to ends. Step 5: Run a wide-tooth comb or fingers from roots to ends to detangle and fully coat hair. Leave for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Step 6: Finish with your favorite TRESemmé styling products as desired. Are you looking for a moisturizing conditioner for damaged hair? The clear choice is TRESemmé. Use TRESemmé Moisture Rich Conditioner with TRESemmé's salon-quality hair styling products to perfect your look. These professional, salon-quality hair care products are deep conditioning hair products for dry hair without the salon price tag. Hair feeling dull or dry? TRESemmé Moisture Rich Detangling Spray is a conditioning, leave-in detangler that delivers intense nourishment and hydration, giving tresses a beautiful, healthy shine. Or give your hair the deep-rooted moisture it craves. TRESemmé Moisture Rich Deep Conditioning Mask works hard so you don’t have to, delivering intense nourishment that leaves hair looking healthy and happy in just one use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: There’s just something about a trip to the salon that makes you feel good about yourself. With TRESemmé products, you can enjoy a professional-quality experience every day. Moisture Rich Conditioner is a moisturizing system formulated with Vitamin E and Biotin to target dryness and lock in moisture where your hair needs it most.

The Moisture Rich Difference Our Moisture Rich system is designed to nourish and support every strand, leaving you with touchably soft, healthy-feeling hair. Our Ingredients Formulated with Vitamin E and Biotin to soften hair without weighing it down and help repair damage. NY Fashion Week Trends change but style is forever. When designers show at New York Fashion Week, TRESemmé is there to make sure not a strand of hair is out of place. Our Pledge to You We’re committed to closing the leadership gap in fashion with our pledge to advance and accelerate women into roles of authority. #WomenLeadTheWay

TRESemmé Moisture Rich Nourishing Detangling Spray TRESemmé Moisture Rich Deep Conditioning Mask Sachet TRESemmé Moisture Rich Shampoo Main Benefit Our leave-in detangler delivers intense nourishment and hydration. Our deep-conditioning mask gives hair the moisture it needs to look healthy — in just one use. This gentle moisturizing shampoo with vitamin E helps to restore softness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We’re looking for this bottle on Amazon, I saw lotta different distributors, post a similar bottle, which made it feel photoshopped. These bottles are the real deal and are really well priced.For those with dry ends, or need a really good moisturizer for the hair, this is a really good product to use. I’ve been using this product for years and it always works wonders on my hair. I have long brown hair and this works as a really nice moisturizer for my ends.One bottle usually last me around 2 to 3 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to dilute demi-permanent hair dye
reviews.reviewText: This white conditioner is a staple for me. It's thick but not heavy, and the white color makes it perfect for mixing with veggie-based demi-permanent hair dyes to dilute them when I dye my hair. The large 3-pack means I always have plenty on hand since I use quite a bit when I dye my hair.After letting it sit in my hair for 45-60 minutes, my hair is so soft and shiny. My hair becomes scented for several days and I always get compliments on how nice it smells!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner smellsss amazing and leaves my hair really moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the stuff my hair is soft manageable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: I regularly see deals on Amazon for TRESemmé shampoos and conditioners. I think this is the best cheap stuff out there. I'm not one to splurge on the fancy stuff, but when I have, I haven't found any of them to be any nicer than this, so I keep on ordering it. If it ain't broke, don't fix it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes you hair feel great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper than off brand
reviews.reviewText: I usually but the Walmart off brand of this product, but they only sale it as a combo pack with the shampoo. We run out of conditioner way faster than the shampoo, and as such, I have extra bottles of shampoo. I found this 3 set on Amazon and was happy with the price and the size. Works great!
